The metric interface provides by default a set of basic metrics. However, user may want to define other metrics, such as linear sums or different ratios, or combining some criteria... This is possible thanks to the
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_new_metric_color.gif 0 button of the context tool. An interface, "New metric" dialog, allows then the creation of four different kinds of metrics:

New metrics are increasingly added to the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/60_metric_tool/metric_toolbar.html#new metric metric menu , and are available for
/tools/eiffelstudio/how_to_s/70_analyzing_a_project/10_computing_a_measure/10_calculating_a_measure.xml calculation .
